Package game

Class TileID

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.TileID
  • public class TileID
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains helper methods for dealing with tile IDs. While tile IDs are just long integers, they contain encoded information and are not usually just an index to a tile within the tile set.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TileID()

      Indicates whether or not a tile is flipped vertically.
      static boolean isValid​(long tileID)
      Indicates if a tile ID is valid or not.
      static long toIndex​(long tileID)

    • Method Detail

      • isFlippedDiagonally

        public static boolean isFlippedDiagonally​(long tileID)
        Indicates whether or not a tile is flipped diagonally.
        Parameters:
        tileID - The ID of the tile to check for horizontal flipping.
        Returns:
        True if the tile is diagonally flipped, false otherwise.

      • isFlippedHorizontally

        public static boolean isFlippedHorizontally​(long tileID)
        Indicates whether or not a tile is flipped horizontally.
        Parameters:
        tileID - The ID of the tile to check for horizontal flipping.
        Returns:
        True if the tile is horizontally flipped, false otherwise.

      • isFlippedVertically

        public static boolean isFlippedVertically​(long tileID)
        Indicates whether or not a tile is flipped vertically.
        Parameters:
        tileID - The ID of the tile to check for vertical flipping.
        Returns:
        True if the tile is vertically flipped, false otherwise.

      • isValid

        public static boolean isValid​(long tileID)
        Indicates if a tile ID is valid or not. Tile ID values that are less than that of the first GID are considered to be invalid.
        Returns:
        True if the tile ID is valid, false if it's not.

      • toIndex

        public static long toIndex​(long tileID)
        Converts the tile ID to an index that refers to a tile in the tile set.
        Parameters:
        tileID - The tile ID to convert.
        Returns:
        An index pointing to a tile in the tile set.
